name: 69 Balls
description:
A Third-Person shooting game but you are not a person. You are a BALL!

Imagine a pool ball, a shotgun and football mechanics mashed together! You said you can't? Neither do I! Just shoot everything you see and pray if the black ball goes in!

Shoot your friends, shoot the ball, shoot the obstacles, just shoot them all!



Game Includes:
  • Shoot
  • Shoot
  • Shoot
  • Shoot
  • Ball
